added:
âš¡ï¸ Oh, Hey There! Thanks for adding me, I'm Rotom-2.0, developed by @Warning_MadBoy_is_Here. My trainer merged me with a Telegram Bot, so I can give you a lot of informations about the Pokemon world! These are my commands: 
 
/start: Command list 
/data PokemonName: Get information about that PokÃ©mon 
/usage: Get current VGC usage on PokÃ©mon Showdown 
/faq: FAQ â“
/about: Informations about me ğŸ¤©
faq: â“ FAQ Q: What is Rotom-2.0? A: Rotom-2.0 is a actually a bot developed by @Warning_MadBoy_is_Here on basis of @RotomgramBot, which acts as a helper for trainers on Telegram. You can check information of Pokemon, Showdown usage and organize Raids as quickly as possible, without ever leaving the app Q: How to get Pokemon informations? A: Just write Pokemon name after /data command (e.g.: /data Rotom) Q: How can I help? A: You can help me in several ways: - Pull Request/Issue on Rotomgram GitHub Repository page - Report me tips/bugs in private (@alessiocelentano, @Warning_MadBoy_is_Here) - Follow @rotomgram
